text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS GX502GV-PB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS GX502GV-PB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS GX502GV-PB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The ASUS GX502GV-PB74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
